input.sentences: this is the family 's favorite picnic spot .
we wait for mom to find our football .
i love my sunglasses | mom bought them for me .
duke is happy to be with us .
our burgers will be ready in no time .
output.sentences: I had come to the river by the bridge for some quietude.
The next thing I knew, there was a child and a man who wanted to throw the football.
The little boy with the sunglasses asked me if I could move so they could throw the ball.
I looked at the little boy, his dad and the dog they had brought with and nodded yes, I would move.
After the boy and the man stopped throwing the ball they asked if I would sit by their fire.
